div.p: Attention Viking Youth Football and Parents! Here is information on Swan Valley Youth Football registration for the upcoming season.

SVSD families: The internet can now be accessed via Swan Valley Guest wifi from the parking lots in front of Havens Elementary and Swan Valley Middle School. Those without internet access are certainly welcome to take advantage of this feature.

SVSD celebrates our Administrative Professional "Heroes!" Please reach out to them and thank them for all they do for our students & staff: Shawn, Chris, Brenda, Stephanie, Kim P, Shelly, Kim M, Kelly, Lori, Jodi, and Gina. Thank you for holding us all together!
Two years in a row Swan Valley High School is recognized by US News and World Report as one of the top high schools in the nation!

#3 in Saginaw County
#142 in Michigan
#3950 in the nation
Rotary Scholarship Fundraiser: Although the May 14th event @ the Children's Zoo is postponed, Raffle Tickets are still being sold. Contact mmcrae@svsd.us if interested in a ticket.
